node.title: 8. Choose Emptiness to Be Filled
node.description:
Being emptied of self is key to receiving the Holy Spirit and working in the power of God. In the SOP there are many words associated with the needing for emptying, including being broken and dying to self. What do the Bible and SOP say on this topic.

 

For PDF series guide, click here: 

http://www.path2prayer.com/article/1192/revival-and-holy-spirit/books-sermons/new-resources/discipleheart#RevivalNowBentonHarbor
